description: Numerators of Van der Pol numbers.
references: F. T. Howard, Properties of the van der Pol numbers and polynomials, R. Reine Angew. Math., 260 (1973), 35-46.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=0..200
mathematica: max = 27; g[x_] = x^3/(6*x*(E^x + 1) - 12*(E^x - 1)); Numerator[ CoefficientList[ Series[ g[x], {x, 0, max}], x]*Range[0, max]!](* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Nov 17 2011, after g.f. *)
